communicator
Class ServerSideCommunicator

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      communicator.ServerSideCommunicator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ServerSideCommunicator
extends java.lang.Thread

This class acts as a helper class for the server, it is the responsibility of this class is to send message to user as well as update user on various events. Its a singleton class associated with the server object.
